001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
008
009import java.net.URI;
010
011/**
012 * Configuration class for JSON-RPC client. Contains complete URL, username, and password.
013 */
014public class RpcConfig {
015
016    private final Network network;
017    private final URI uri;
018    private final String   username;
019    private final String   password;
020
021    public RpcConfig(Network network, URI uri, String username, String password) {
022        this.network = network;
023        this.uri = uri;
024        this.username = username;
025        this.password = password;
026    }
027
028    public RpcConfig(String netIdString,  URI uri, String username, String password) {
029        this(BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(netIdString).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("invalid network string")),
030                uri,
031                username,
032                password);
033    }
034
035    @JsonCreator
036    public RpcConfig(@JsonProperty("netid")     String netIdString,
037                     @JsonProperty("uri")       String uri,
038                     @JsonProperty("username")  String username,
039                     @JsonProperty("password")  String password)  {
040        this(BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(netIdString).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("invalid network string")),
041                URI.create(uri),
042                username,
043                password);
044    }
045
046    @JsonIgnore
047    public Network network() {
048        return network;
049    }
050
051    @JsonProperty("netid")
052    public String getNetIdString() {
053        return network.id();
054    }
055
056    public URI getURI() {
057        return uri;
058    }
059
060    public String getUsername() {
061        return username;
062    }
063
064    public String getPassword() {
065        return password;
066    }
067}
